item.description:
Hi Everyone,

We'll be watching Atonement at the West Newton Cinema on Washington Street (route 16) at 3:40 PM. Parking is available on the street. If you need directions or anything else please contact me. I think tickets are $9.50 each and the theater accepts cash only.

Regards,
Danika
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red hooded sweatshirt. Let's meet in the lobby 15 minutes before showtime (showtime is 3:40 PM, so let's meet at 3:25 PM).
item.why: Our own March Madness-- Atonement the book and Atonement the movie in the same month.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: Atonement The Movie
